title: Senior UX/UI Designer
description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior UX/UI Designer who will bring attractive interaction into our products and give our users the ease of use, to work in our office based in Ho Chi Minh city.
 Improve and optimize the UX/UI of our web based products on multiple platforms
 Design the work flow as well as UX/UI of our native apps and web based products
 Build UI/UX for new products for app and web
 Understand business requirements and users behaviors in order to create a suitable design for development or integration
 Develop ideas for improving our products
requirements:
 2+ experience in UX design, in which 1+ year of mobile apps design
 Being creative and proactive
 Catch-up with latest trends in design and new technologies in the world
 Familiar with creating wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows
 Excellent skills of Photoshop, Illustrator
 Experience in using other development or editing tools (Dreamweaver, Sublime Text for example) will be a plus
 Basic knowledge of SEO and social network, and be willing to challenge yourself in these fields
 Good knowledge of CSS3, HTML5, Javascript is an advantage
 Good English skills (reading/writing is a must)
